    Defines function get_exception.

import sys
from typing import Any, List

__author__ = 'Vladimir Roncevic'
__copyright__ = '(C) 2024, https://vroncevic.github.io/testspeednet'
__credits__: List[str] = ['Vladimir Roncevic', 'Python Software Foundation']
__license__ = 'https://github.com/vroncevic/testspeednet/blob/dev/LICENSE'
__version__ = '1.0.0'
__maintainer__ = 'Vladimir Roncevic'
__email__ = 'elektron.ronca@gmail.com'
__status__ = 'Updated'




[docs]
def get_exception() -> Any:
    '''
        Retrieves the most recent exception raised.

        :return: The exception object
        :rtype: <Any>
        :exceptions: None
    '''
    return sys.exc_info()[1]
